attributes.action: Offer sessions with music for neurodivergent people taking drivers theory tests
attributes.additional_details: I have spoken to many neurodivergent people and they struggle with the quietness of the exam room. So many people with AuADHD take many times to pass the exam but at home pass on practice apps.
attributes.background: Silence for some neurodivergent people is unsettling. Having a few sessions weekly for people with special needs to listen to instrumental music is really calming and helps with concentration.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about the arrangements for driving theory tests are a matter for the DVLA, not the UK Government or Parliament.
